articles.author: Christian Arnold
articles.title: NFL finally replacing antiquated chain gang to measure first downs - New York Post
articles.description: The league would use the tech as their primary way to determine if the ball had crossed the first-down line.
articles.content:
The NFL is planning to phase out chain-gang measurements this upcoming season.
NFL Networks Mike Garafolo reported Wednesday that the league is slated to move to Hawk-Eye virtual technology to help … [+2348 chars]

articles.content:
